trade.title: Trade electives
trade.empty: Didn’t like the elective you chose? Create a trade request and find a friend to trade with.
trade.unavailable_future: Trading electives is not available at the moment. You can trade electives with your friends on May 29th. Check back later.
trade.unavailable_past: Trading electives is no longer available.

createRequest.title: Trade with a friend
createRequest.desc: Enter the 5-digit student ID of the friend you want to trade electives with.

snackbar.self: You really thought we would allow that?
snackbar.notAllowed: You can’t trade electives with that person
